fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Footprints: Learn if the first person you complete a Trade with wins with the current King (Susceptible). Will not activate on the player you chose for Detective’s Chase. [Activates D3]
- Detective’s Chase: Choose a player by the end of Night 2. If you have used both uses of Detect, activated Footprints, and both you and the chosen player are alive on D5, you learn if you win with the chosen player (True). [Activates D5]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Detect: Pick 1 non-Revealed player that isn’t yourself. Then pick 3 more players. Learn if the majority of them either win or don’t win with the initial target at the end of the phase. First check is Uncertain, second check is Susceptible. [2 uses, 4 CD, Astral, Unlocks D3] 
- Documents: Gain a non-Special Item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
